foreignData.name: Gedanken radieren
foreignData.text: Jeder Gegner deckt Karten oben von seiner Bibliothek auf, bis er X Land-Karten aufdeckt, dann legt er alle auf diese Weise aufgedeckten Karten auf seinen Friedhof. X kann nicht 0 sein.

foreignData.name: Moler la mente
foreignData.text: Cada oponente muestra cartas de la parte superior de su biblioteca hasta que muestre X cartas de tierra, luego pone en su cementerio todas las cartas mostradas de esta manera. X no puede ser 0.

foreignData.name: Broyeur d'esprit
foreignData.text: Chaque adversaire révèle les cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque jusqu'à révéler X cartes de terrain, puis il met toutes les cartes révélées de cette manière dans son cimetière. X ne peut pas être 0.

foreignData.name: Macina Mentale
foreignData.text: Ogni avversario rivela carte dalla cima del proprio grimorio fino a che non rivela X carte terra, poi mette tutte le carte rivelate in questo modo nel proprio cimitero. X non può essere 0.

foreignData.name: 精神削り
foreignData.text: 各対戦相手はそれぞれ自分のライブラリーの一番上から、土地カードがＸ枚公開されるまでカードを公開し続ける。その後これにより公開されたすべてのカードを自分の墓地に置く。Ｘは０にできない。

foreignData.name: 정신 갈아엎기
foreignData.text: 각 상대는 대지 카드가 X장 나올 때까지 자신의 서고 맨 위에서부터 카드를 공개한 후, 공개된 카드들을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다. X는 0일 수 없다.

foreignData.name: Trituração Mental
foreignData.text: Cada oponente revela cards do topo do próprio grimório até revelar X cards de terreno e, depois, coloca todos os cards revelados dessa maneira no próprio cemitério. X não pode ser 0.

foreignData.name: Перемалывание Разума
foreignData.text: Каждый оппонент показывает карты с верха своей библиотеки до тех пор, пока не покажет Х карт земель, затем кладет все показанные таким образом карты на свое кладбище. Х не может равняться 0.

foreignData.name: 心灵绞裂
foreignData.text: 每个对手分别自其牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出X张地牌为止，然后将以此法展示的所有牌置入各自的坟墓场。X不能为0。

foreignData.name: 心靈絞裂
foreignData.text: 每位對手分別自其牌庫頂開始展示牌，直到展示出X張地牌為止，然後將以此法展示的所有牌置入各自的墳墓場。X不能為0。

name: Mind Grind
originalText: Each opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals X land cards, then puts all cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard. X can't be 0.

rulings.text: If an opponent’s library contains fewer than X land cards, all cards from that library are revealed and put into their graveyard.

If another spell or ability instructs you to cast Mind Grind “without paying its mana cost,” you won’t be able to. You must pick 0 as the value of X in the mana cost of a spell being cast “without paying its mana cost,” but the X in Mind Grind’s mana cost can’t be 0.

text: Each opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal X land cards, then puts all cards revealed this way into their graveyard. X can't be 0.
